doc.field: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
creation: 1754; alteration: circa 1810; alteration: 1930s; alteration: 1941; alteration: 1941
Merchant Mill & Sawmill--Lochlyns Mill--Pen Park Mill--Rock House--Park Mills--Glade Cottage--2 Federal mantels from Massachusetts--Frederick S Hill, DC Lawyer, additions 1941--John Cochran 1852

Millhouse: 1 Story Stone, Hall-Parlor, Telescopic Form, Square Columns, Lambs Tongue Details, Cellar Spring, Winter Kitchen, Reciprocating Saw Marks, Circular Saw Marks, Root Cellar, 4/4, 6/6, Ghost; Merchant Mill: 1 Story Stone w/2 Story Frame above 50'x36,' 2 Story Frame Wing 24'x20,' 3 Pairs Burr Stones; Saw Mill: 40'x14'
survey data: Mutual Assurance Society Insurance Policy
Rt 631, on Meadow Creek, North of Charlottesville
